rules_text:
[i]({T}: Add {W}.)[/i]
Tomb of the First Fighter enters tapped.
Whenever a land enters under your control, if you control five or more Plains, amass Soldiers 2. [i](Put two +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. It’s also a Soldier. If you don’t control one, create a 0/0 black Soldier Army creature token first.)[/i]
